name: Nostalgia (itch)
description:
Nostalgia

Controls:
Left Mouse Click - scrolling around the map
Right Mouse Click - to aim the spot where you think the match will be stuck
Mouse Wheel - scroll to zoom in / out the map
Button "Place" - to confirm the aim spot and start floating
Button "Restart" - will show when you lose, restarts the game

Description:

Sometimes life goes out of control. And all you have - is a little chance to predict where will lead you this endless stream of a life-long river. We are just little matches, who unable to control the water around. But what we can for sure is to be strong enough to keep trying to figure out the future.

Gameplay:

You will have a unique chance to drown in the river of nostalgia while launching matches down the stream, like in childhood.

You don't have any control over the match, but you can try to predict where will it stuck!
